Headline: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick rider at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-Bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick rider at Clark/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
